title: What's new in v2.55.0
content:
Features:
  • Layer fx
     ◦ Pattern overlay
     ◦ Color overlay
     ◦ Outline
     ◦ Anti-aliasing
  • Levels adjustment for all R, G, B, and A channels independently
  • Rescaling content option when resizing the canvas
  • Cel z-index

Enhancements:
  • Auto-save for iCloud
  • Collapse button for reference images
  • Tile grid no longer shows ... on small devices
  • Clear all button for the gradient tool
  • Dynamic scaling for guide line in the preview
  • The bottom info bar also shows the start time of a frame
  • Other UI enhancements

Fixes:
  • Minor compatibility issue with older Aseprite files
  • Cursor mode cannot draw multiple strokes without lifting the touch
